    Introduction to using FlickrAPI

    Introduction to using FlickrAPI

    introduction.Rmd

    This vignette provides a quick tour of the R package “FlickrAPI”. This package is maintained by Koki Ando.

    Installation 

    # devtools::install_github("koki25ando/FlickrAPI")
library(FlickrAPI)

    Setting up a Flickr API key 

    # Set the API key for a single session
setFlickrAPIKey(api_key = "YOUR_API_KEY_HERE")

# Install the API key for future sessions
setFlickrAPIKey(api_key = "YOUR_API_KEY_HERE", install = TRUE)

# Overwrite an existing API key
setFlickrAPIKey(api_key = "YOUR_API_KEY_HERE", overwrite = TRUE)

    Searching for Flickr photos

    There are two functions for searching Flickr photos:

    • getPhotos()
    • getPhotoSearch()

    getPhotos() allows you to get public photos for any Flickr user or all photos from the account associated with the Flickr API key.

    # Search for photos uploaded by Koki Ando
user_photos <- getPhotos(user_id = "141696738@N08") 

knitr::kable(user_photos[1:4,])
    id owner secret server farm title ispublic isfriend isfamily
    50075871982 141696738@N08 4907809554 65535 66 Iceberg 1 0 0
    50075872142 141696738@N08 e599416333 65535 66 Arcitc Expedition 1 0 0
    50075872267 141696738@N08 a6afd58871 65535 66 Arcitc Expedition 1 0 0
    50075618941 141696738@N08 fe377071d9 65535 66 Adventure 1 0 0

    getPhotoSearch() supports a broader range of search options including:

    • User id
    • Tags
    • License
    • Bounding box (for photos with locations)
    photo_search <- getPhotoSearch(tags = c("cats","dogs"))

knitr::kable(photo_search[1:4,])
    id owner secret server farm title ispublic isfriend isfamily
    916353866 62631588@N00 7fe8eecc2c 1034 2 Jingle Bell ROCK! aka “Mikey” 1 0 0
    472336118 7211785@N06 d4eb3ec1b4 217 1 357 1 0 0
    472413421 7211785@N06 7346115bd7 182 1 270 1 0 0
    472351917 7211785@N06 0efb4711d3 215 1 364 1 0 0 
    # Search for photos of cats and dogs in North Carolina
nc <- sf::st_read(system.file("shape/nc.shp", package = "sf"))
#> Reading layer `nc' from data source 
#>   `/Library/Frameworks/R.framework/Versions/4.1/Resources/library/sf/shape/nc.shp' 
#>   using driver `ESRI Shapefile'
#> Simple feature collection with 100 features and 14 fields
#> Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON
#> Dimension:     XY
#> Bounding box:  xmin: -84.32385 ymin: 33.88199 xmax: -75.45698 ymax: 36.58965
#> Geodetic CRS:  NAD27
nc_bbox <- sf::st_bbox(nc)

bbox_search <- getPhotoSearch(tags = c("cats","dogs"), bbox = nc_bbox) 

knitr::kable(bbox_search[1:4,])
    id owner secret server farm title ispublic isfriend isfamily
    680291 54289096@N00 733cc6e503 1 1 House Fire 1 0 0
    786352 54289096@N00 20ff2df2d2 1 1 cat on brick wal 1 0 0
    987600 54289096@N00 cfb00ead3a 1 1 Bailey does a dance for Luna. 1 0 0
    987601 54289096@N00 31a95ca091 1 1 luna & bailey lying down 1 0 0

    getPhotoSearch() returns 100 photos per page by default but this can be increased to 250 if using the bbox parameter searching by location or 500 otherwise. Additional pages can be accessed using the page parameter.

    The extras parameter can be used to return additional information about the photos including “description”, “date_upload”, “date_taken”, “owner_name”, and urls for all available image sizes.

    # Search for photos tagged "panda" in the area of Ueno Zoo, Tokyo, Japan
photo_search_extras <-
  getPhotoSearch(
  tags = "panda",
  bbox = c(139.7682226529, 35.712627977, 139.7724605432, 35.7181464141),
  sort = "interestingness-desc",
  extras = c("geo", "tags")
)
knitr::kable(photo_search_extras[1:4,])
    id owner secret server farm title ispublic isfriend isfamily tags latitude longitude accuracy context place_id woeid geo_is_public geo_is_contact geo_is_friend geo_is_family
    51055427717 40316695@N04 f7ef0f97e7 65535 66 Ri Ri 2020-12-09 1 0 0 tokyo uenozoo 上野動物園 uenozoologicalgardens zoo 動物園 東京都 台東区 japan bear クマ 熊 giantpanda ジャイアントパンダ panda パンダ 熊猫 大熊猫 riri 比力 リーリー 35.714466 139.769930 16 0 10967866 1 0 0 0
    51054619898 40316695@N04 67ba302e58 65535 66 Ri Ri 2020-12-09 1 0 0 tokyo uenozoo 上野動物園 uenozoologicalgardens zoo 動物園 東京都 台東区 japan bear クマ 熊 giantpanda ジャイアントパンダ panda パンダ 熊猫 大熊猫 riri 比力 リーリー 35.714466 139.769930 16 0 10967866 1 0 0 0
    51055426837 40316695@N04 d4909db750 65535 66 Ri Ri 2020-12-09 1 0 0 tokyo uenozoo 上野動物園 uenozoologicalgardens zoo 動物園 東京都 台東区 japan bear クマ 熊 giantpanda ジャイアントパンダ panda パンダ 熊猫 大熊猫 riri 比力 リーリー 35.714466 139.769930 16 0 10967866 1 0 0 0
    51054618878 40316695@N04 f8de3862bb 65535 66 Ri Ri 2020-12-09 1 0 0 tokyo uenozoo 上野動物園 uenozoologicalgardens zoo 動物園 東京都 台東区 japan bear クマ 熊 giantpanda ジャイアントパンダ panda パンダ 熊猫 大熊猫 riri 比力 リーリー 35.714475 139.769927 16 0 10967866 1 0 0 0

    Get data on Flickr photos

    There are two functions for getting data about a specific Flickr photo:

    • getExif()
    • getPhotoInfo()

    Get Flickr data for a photo 

    photo_info <- getPhotoInfo(photo_id="51899696261", 
             output = "url")

knitr::kable(photo_info)
    type content
    photopage https://www.flickr.com/photos/nasa2explore/51899696261/

    Get EXIF metadata for a photo 

    photo_exif <- getExif(photo_id="51872765082")

knitr::kable(photo_exif[1:4,])
    tagspace tagspaceid tag label raw clean
    IFD0 0 Compression Compression JPEG (old-style) NA
    IFD0 0 ImageDescription Image Description GMT038_22_42_For ESA_Matthias Maurer_1091_Concrete Hardeing and PAO Maurer NA
    IFD0 0 Make Make NIKON CORPORATION NA
    IFD0 0 Model Model NIKON D5 NA
